alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 7:11PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Oglala Lakota County through 745 PM MDT... At 710 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Red Shirt to 3 miles south of Dry Wood Housing to 5 miles southeast of Slim Buttes Housing. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Ridge, Oglala, Porcupine, Manderson, Wounded Knee, Lonesome Valley, Loneman, Goose Neck Housing, Dry Wood Housing, South Lakeside, Thunder Valley, Rockyford, Red Shirt, Sharps Corner, Number 4, Calico, Evergreen, Wolf Creek Housing, Porcupine Butte Housing and Red Shirt Table Overlook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
